702654f-a.text:
23rd Street e. fr. Third Avenue, Brooklyn.
Neg. no. A-1328
P. L. Sperr, photographer
July 26, 1940

702655f-a.text:
23rd Street, east from Third Avenue, showing clearances just east of the avenue, where Gowanus Parkway, s part of the Belt Parkway road system, will be constructed. The houses are on the north side of the street.
October 17, 1940

P. L. Sperr

702278f.text:
720 to 728 3rd Avenue, at 23rd Street. The east side of the avenue (foreground) is being widened as part of Brooklyn's northerly extension of the Belt Parkway.
October 23, 1940
P.L. Sperr

View 2 shows to east side of the avenue from 24th to 23rd Streets, during demolition.
July 21, 1940

view 2: Neg. No. A-952
